reviews.review_text: Best restaurant in the area! Very friendly people and very welcoming. Delicious food and efficiently served. Italian , Canadian and Egyptian dishes . Nice authentic plates . Highly recommend it for everyone. We will be back again and again Vegetarian options: Yes Lots of options Dietary restrictions: Lots of options Parking: Paid parking all around Kid-friendliness: Very kid friendly Wheelchair accessibility: Accessible
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for trying our food and we wish to serve you again

reviews.review_text: Love this place the food is so good. Enjoyed everything in photo I posted. The lamb is so tasty specially the lamb with okra. Highly recommended. My rest of the family loves it too.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for trying our food and we wish to serve you again

reviews.review_text: The food was so professionally put together. The taste was splendid. The owners are so friendly. Everything was simply perfect. They even gave us tea as a good gesture. Their salmon salad is one of the best salads I have ever tasted. Only thing missing was Coke Zero, but this wont stop us from visiting again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for trying our food and we wish to serve you again

reviews.review_text: Really good place to eat. Everything is halal. It was a different taste for me but I really liked it. Will surely visit again. The service was great too, chef explained the menu well to help us decide. Egyptian lamb curry was served with rice and pita bread. It was a different combination for me, but I really liked it. Its a new place so I would highly people to give this local restaurant a try. Support local!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for trying our food and we wish to serve you again

reviews.review_text: I believe it s only place in the Lower Mainland that serves Koshary. It s terrific and worth every penny. Other pan-Arabian and Italian dishes are also on the menu and are good. The service is personal and attentive, especially after the lunch crowd is gone. Dietary restrictions: Halal
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for trying our food, we wish to serve you again

reviews.review_text: Loved the variety of Egyptian food that they have. They offer superb traditional Egyptian breakfast that would be great for any vegeterian out there. Tried Luca for Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner and loved all their meal options. I tried their Koshari, Okra stew and Lamb shanks as well and were all great (only if the onion rings for Koshari were a bit more crispy) but nevetheless it is soooo delicious and very very reasonably priced The service is excellent no debate, highly recommend One final thing... the tea with mint is just perfect :) Vegetarian options: Kushary and the breakfast of course
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for trying our food and we wish to serve you again

reviews.review_text: Went here last week and had a great experience! The staff are welcoming, friendly, and attentive. We ordered the linguini bolognese and Egyptian lamb curry with rice (I think the curry is a special for the weekends). Both had amazing flavors and were so fresh! I love pasta so I was so excited to try this dish. This is my kind of comfort food. Prices are really reasonable too! Cant wait to come back and try some more dishes, especially the koshari!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for trying our food and we wish to serve you again

reviews.review_text: Came here to try out the Egyptian and Italian dishes based on the previous reviews. Enjoyed our meals with the Egyptian tea and rice pudding. Had pleasure to meet the owner(chef), Ibrahim. Will be back for other signature dishes soon.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for trying our food and we wish to serve you again

reviews.review_text: We went to Luca restaurant as a family and we enjoyed the place so much The restaurant was very comfy and the chef is very friendly and super talented, their hospitality and working staff were really nice too The food is really tasty especially the kushery was very delicious. we also tried chicken shawarma wrap, lentil soup and beef tacos the taste was amazingggg Also we had kunafa cupcakes, chocolate lava cake and egyptian basbosa as a dessert and they taste yummmy we couldn t stop eating we had an amazing experience definitely we will be back
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for trying our food. We wish to serve you great taste and great quality always. And we hope to see you again at Luca restaurant

reviews.review_text: I went to Luca Restaurant this week, and I really liked it. I tried Kushary, a famous Egyptian food, and it was yummy. The service was excellent, and the staff made me feel welcome. I totally recommend this restaurant!

reviews.review_text: What a lovely experience we had today with our friends at Luca restaurant. I can say everything was perfect. Location is great, indoor and outdoor seating areas, vibes of place are encouraging to go there more and more. They serve most of the authentic Egyptian food that you can t resist. Egyptian breakfast that is served every Saturday and Sunday were amazing including fava beans, falafel and others. The most famous Egyptian dish ( Koshari) that can be eaten any time of the day were done so professionally. Staff are friendly, helpful and available for any request. Food, vibes and service are so perfect that for sure will go there again. Dietary restrictions: Just inform them and they will be sure to follow all diet restrictions. Parking: Street parking is easily available and it s only $1.5. Kid-friendliness: Very nice dishes for kids from all ages Wheelchair accessibility: It s wheelchair accessible.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for trying our food and we wish to serve you again

reviews.review_text: All the dishes we tried were really good. We tried chicken and beef tacos, kushery with beef, spaghetti meatballs, and chocolate lava cake. Kushery was the highlight. You have a mix of Egyptian, Italian, and some Mexican cuisine. The owner was extremely attentive and friendly. We had a great conversation. They have started to serve breakfast on the weekends as well. I want to come back to try that. Great atmosphere and the prices are very good compared to other places where you nowhere near get the same quality and service. Everything is halal on the menu too.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for trying our food. We wish to serve you again

reviews.review_text: This place will shock your taste buds in a very enjoyable way! If you like middle eastern flavors with a pinch of traditional Egyptian feel, then this place is your utopia. Food is so good that you wont believe yourself. What makes the experience even better is that owners, who work themselves, welcome you as if youre a life long friend! If you ever been to Egypt, youd know that level of hospitality and warmth in greeting and welcoming you! You feel like you dont want to leave this place because you feel so good between the food and the whole environment. I highly recommend! BUT be warned the experience may cause you to be addicted

reviews.review_text: Me and my friend ordered koshary, lamb curry and mombar (stuffed sausage with rice) . The lamb curry was amazing. The meat is very tender and the soup had a very pleasant flavor . Mombar has a very unique flavor that i have never tasted from any middle east restaurant. I recommend to eat the mombar with the lamb curry. Koshary was 10/10 SO GOOD  everyone who is new to egyptian food must try the koshary and the lamb curry. Don t forget to try the falafel. Only this restaurant make it differently as it is authentic Egyptian. The service is wonderful. Staff and chef gave an excellent service and are friendly. I will definitely come back for more Vegetarian options: Falafel

reviews.review_text: Tried Kushary (for the first time) from this Gem of a Restaurant close to the Pacific Central Train Station. The service was great and the chef even came out to ask everyone who was eating if they enjoyed the food. The dish itself was very flavorful and reminded me of a Spicy Arrabiata Pasta but with more flavor depth and lots of different types of Carbs to soak up the juices. You have Macaroni, Vermicelli, Lentils and Chick Peas, plus Fried Shallots, mixed with a Fiery Tomato Sauce Broth, but even though the dish is spicy, the Carb elements soften the flavor up, allowing you to take in all the different layers of flavor. Also, not pictured, is a fantastic Rice Pudding that was very thick and creamy.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for trying our food and we wish to serve you again

Also, know that they have a special brunch on weekends and special Egyptian dishes on Fridays :) Lastly,  the mint tea is my best thing to have there after finishing my food! reviews.review_text: A hidden gem! We went here yesterday and the food is bomb The owner/cook Ibrahim is so so nice! Gave us a complimentary lentil soup before our orders came in. The serving size, the sauce, the pasta texture, presentation and all we would definitely be back here! To top it up, when we where about to leave we were again given a complimentary dessert the rice pudding which the owner said is his secret recipe! I definitely can say why, its sooo soo good. I recommend this place, give it a visit!

reviews.review_text: We had the pleasure of dining at this wonderful Egyptian restaurant, even though we arrived a bit late just before closing time. The staff was incredibly hospitable and accommodating, making our experience truly enjoyable. We indulged in a variety of dishes, including Fattah, Koshary, mombar, and pasta, and each one exceeded our expectations. The flavors were exquisite, and it was evident that the ingredients used were of the highest quality. Despite our tardy arrival, the team went above and beyond to ensure we had a delightful dining experience. We highly recommend this restaurant to anyone seeking not only delicious Egyptian cuisine but also exceptional service and a warm atmosphere.

reviews.review_text: Best Mediterranean food in Vancouver. Service was excellent, I ve tried koshary and lentil soap taste was amazing. The atmosphere was warm friendly and clean. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_text: One of the rare and authentic Egyptian food to find around Vancouver. Absolutely amazing! To all my vegan/ vegetarian pals (and to everyone), you should definitely try Luca s kushary, a local Egyptian dish.

reviews.review_text: What a great halal restaurant in Vancouver! We got the bolognese, shrimp, and alfredo pastas. The linguine were cooked perfectly in all of them and our favourite was the shrimp pasta. It was creamy and flavourful. We also got chicken tacos and if you like soft shell tacos, then it s a must try! The service was wonderful. The chef took his time to greet the tables and offered us a rice pudding on the house. A great addition to cleanse our palates. The rice pudding was rich and creamy and lightly sweetened. Would recommend going there! All the best, Team Luca!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for trying our food and we wish to serve you again

reviews.review_text: Amazing. Amazing! AMAZING!!! Ordered just randomly trying to find good halal options in Vancouver but was so pleasantly surprised with the taste! Truly authentic and delicious!! Especially their traditional dish that came free!!! Cannot recommend enough to all to try atleast once! The italian dishes have perfctly italian taste and the egyptian dishes have true to roots Middle Eastern taste! Reminded us of the Gulf with just one bite!! Kudos! Mashallah!! May Allah gove this business alot of barakah!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for trying our food and we looking forward to serve you again

reviews.review_text: I am willing to come and try the delicious food , all the way from Sydney. Because I know the chef and how delicious is his food . Good luck guys . Food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for your help and support

reviews.review_text: Had Koshary here for lunch. Taste and presentation as well as service was top notch. 5/5
